title: Cyberpunk Neon
description: Style futuriste avec des néons vibrants et une atmosphère cyberpunk sombre.
prompt: cyberpunk neon city, {{subject}}, vibrant colors, dark atmosphere, futuristic, rain-soaked streets, glowing signs

title: Watercolor Dream
description: Style aquarelle doux et onirique avec des couleurs pastel.
prompt: soft watercolor painting of {{subject}}, dreamy atmosphere, pastel colors, gentle brush strokes, artistic

title: Whimsical Illustrations
description: Illustrations fantaisistes et ludiques avec des formes abstraites surdimensionnées, un line art épuré et une palette de couleurs limitée sur fond neutre.
prompt: Create a whimsical, playful illustration featuring {{subject}} as the central focus. The character is drawn with simplified features, a small rounded head, and minimal facial detail, wearing {{clothing}}. They are positioned among oversized abstract shapes and organic elements such as {{decorative_elements}}, creating a sense of imaginative scale. The character is interacting with {{action}}, adding narrative interest. Decorative graphic elements like {{symbols}} float around the subject to enhance expression and energy. Use clean, simple linework and a limited color palette of {{colors}}, keeping the illustration bold and cohesive. The background is a soft neutral tone such as beige or off-white. The overall style is modern, flat, and illustrative, with a lively, creative, and slightly abstract atmosphere.

subject.label: Sujet
subject.description: Le personnage ou sujet central de l'illustration

clothing.label: Vêtements
clothing.description: Description des vêtements ou accessoires du personnage
clothing.placeholder: a beret and a paint-splattered apron

decorative_elements.label: Éléments décoratifs
decorative_elements.description: Objets floraux ou symboliques autour du sujet
decorative_elements.placeholder: giant flowers, abstract leaves, floating circles

action.label: Action
action.description: L'objet ou l'action avec laquelle le personnage interagit

symbols.label: Symboles
symbols.placeholder: exclamation points, music notes, small stars, scribbles

colors.label: Couleurs
colors.placeholder: coral red, mustard yellow, teal blue
